description.narrative: Arrange and oversee the inception phase to prepare for an intervention on climate change adaptation focusing on hazard mapping and related capacity development.

participating-org.narrative: SWISS AGENCY FOR DEVELOPMENT AND COOPERATION - SDC

provider-org.narrative: SWISS AGENCY FOR DEVELOPMENT AND COOPERATION - SDC
SWISS AGENCY FOR DEVELOPMENT AND COOPERATION - SDC

comment.narrative: 1. Comparative Analysis of the climate change adaptation (CCA)/Disaster Risk Reduction Architecture and Norms in Georgia examining existing state and prospects of CCA and DRR systems in Georgia and comparing with the status of the progress achieved in approximation with EU standards as outlined in Georgia and EU Association Agreement was developed. 2. Assessment of hazard mapping system in Georgia, assessing institutional and legal set up for hazard mapping in Georgia, existing practices and gaps; technical and human capacities assessing the progress achieved in approximation with EU association Agreemnt commitments and recommendations for required legal and institutional reforms and development of a road map for capacity development in hazard mapping was developed. 3. Assessment of CCA/IRM practices on local level based on Adjara Autonomous Republic municipalities analysi CCA and DRR practices that included climate change adaptation planning and implementation, multi-hazard risk management planning, municipal-level multi-hazard response and preparedness planning in the six municipalities was developed; 4. Assessment of hazard mapping data needs, data availability and gaps was conducted and relevant recommendations for obtaining the required data was developed
